info.title: Books API
info.description: Lets you search for books and manage your Google Books library.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific bookshelf for the specified user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of user for whom to retrieve bookshelves.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf to retrieve.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Retrieves a list of public bookshelves for the specified user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of user for whom to retrieve bookshelves.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Retrieves volumes in a specific bookshelf for the specified user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of user for whom to retrieve bookshelf volumes.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf to retrieve volumes.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show pre-ordered books. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first element to return (starts at 0)

parameters.name: drive_document_id
parameters.description: A drive document id. The upload_client_token must not be set.

parameters.name: mime_type
parameters.description: The document MIME type. It can be set only if the drive_document_id is set.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The document name. It can be set only if the drive_document_id is set.

post.description: Remove the book and its contents

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The id of the book to be removed.

get.description: Returns a list of offline dictionary meatadata available

parameters.name: cpksver
parameters.description: The device/version ID from which to request the data.

get.description: Gets the layer summary for a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve layers for.

parameters.name: summaryId
parameters.description: The ID for the layer to get the summary for.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the requested volume.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: List the layer summaries for a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve layers for.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the requested volume.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of the nextToken from the previous page.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Gets the annotation data.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve annotations for.

parameters.name: layerId
parameters.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotations.

parameters.name: annotationDataId
parameters.description: The ID of the annotation data to retrieve.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the volume you are trying to retrieve.

parameters.name: allowWebDefinitions
parameters.description: For the dictionary layer. Whether or not to allow web definitions.

parameters.name: h
parameters.description: The requested pixel height for any images. If height is provided width must also be provided.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: The requested scale for the image.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: The requested pixel width for any images. If width is provided height must also be provided.

get.description: Gets the annotation data for a volume and layer.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve annotation data for.

parameters.name: layerId
parameters.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotation data.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the requested volume.

parameters.name: annotationDataId
parameters.description: The list of Annotation Data Ids to retrieve. Pagination is ignored if this is set.

parameters.name: h
parameters.description: The requested pixel height for any images. If height is provided width must also be provided.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of the nextToken from the previous page.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: The requested scale for the image.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: updatedMax
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated prior to this timestamp (exclusive).

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated since this timestamp (inclusive).

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: The requested pixel width for any images. If width is provided height must also be provided.

get.description: Gets the volume annotation.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve annotations for.

parameters.name: layerId
parameters.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotations.

parameters.name: annotationId
parameters.description: The ID of the volume annotation to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Gets the volume annotations for a volume and layer.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to retrieve annotations for.

parameters.name: layerId
parameters.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotations.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the requested volume.

parameters.name: endOffset
parameters.description: The end offset to end retrieving data from.

parameters.name: endPosition
parameters.description: The end position to end retrieving data from.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of the nextToken from the previous page.

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Set to true to return deleted annotations. updatedMin must be in the request to use this. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startOffset
parameters.description: The start offset to start retrieving data from.

parameters.name: startPosition
parameters.description: The start position to start retrieving data from.

parameters.name: updatedMax
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated prior to this timestamp (exclusive).

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated since this timestamp (inclusive).

parameters.name: volumeAnnotationsVersion
parameters.description: The version of the volume annotations that you are requesting.

get.description: Gets the current settings for the user.

parameters.name: volumeIds
parameters.description: The volume(s) to release restrictions for.

parameters.name: cpksver
parameters.description: The device/version ID from which to release the restriction.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1, ISO-3166-1 codes for message localization, i.e. en_US.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Request concurrent and download access restrictions.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to request concurrent/download restrictions for.

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The client nonce value.

parameters.name: cpksver
parameters.description: The device/version ID from which to request the restrictions.

parameters.name: licenseTypes
parameters.description: The type of access license to request. If not specified, the default is BOTH.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1, ISO-3166-1 codes for message localization, i.e. en_US.

post.description: Request downloaded content access for specified volumes on the My eBooks shelf.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The client nonce value.

parameters.name: cpksver
parameters.description: The device/version ID from which to release the restriction.

parameters.name: features
parameters.description: List of features supported by the client, i.e., 'RENTALS'

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1, ISO-3166-1 codes for message localization, i.e. en_US.

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show pre-ordered books. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: volumeIds
parameters.description: The volume(s) to request download restrictions for.

post.description: Sets the settings for the user. If a sub-object is specified, it will overwrite the existing sub-object stored in the server. Unspecified sub-objects will retain the existing value.

parameters.name: annotationId
parameters.description: The ID for the annotation to delete.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: annotationId
parameters.description: The ID for the annotation to update.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location.

parameters.name: showOnlySummaryInResponse
parameters.description: Requests that only the summary of the specified layer be provided in the response.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Retrieves a list of annotations, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version for the requested volume.

parameters.name: layerId
parameters.description: The layer ID to limit annotation by.

parameters.name: layerIds
parameters.description: The layer ID(s) to limit annotation by.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of the nextToken from the previous page.

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Set to true to return deleted annotations. updatedMin must be in the request to use this. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: updatedMax
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated prior to this timestamp (exclusive).

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to restrict to items updated since this timestamp (inclusive).

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The volume to restrict annotations to.

post.description: Gets the summary of specified layers.

parameters.name: layerIds
parameters.description: Array of layer IDs to get the summary for.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Volume id to get the summary for.

post.description: Adds a volume to a bookshelf.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf to which to add a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume to add.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for which the book is added to the library.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Clears all volumes from a bookshelf.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf from which to remove a volume.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific bookshelf belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf to retrieve.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Retrieves a list of bookshelves belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Moves a volume within a bookshelf.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf with the volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume to move.

parameters.name: volumePosition
parameters.description: Position on shelf to move the item (0 puts the item before the current first item, 1 puts it between the first and the second and so on.)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Removes a volume from a bookshelf.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: ID of bookshelf from which to remove a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume to remove.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for which the book is removed from the library.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Gets volume information for volumes on a bookshelf.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: The bookshelf ID or name retrieve volumes for.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Full-text search query string in this bookshelf.

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show pre-ordered books. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first element to return (starts at 0)

get.description: Retrieves my reading position information for a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume for which to retrieve a reading position.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: Volume content version for which this reading position is requested.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Sets my reading position information for a volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume for which to update the reading position.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: RFC 3339 UTC format timestamp associated with this reading position.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position string for the new volume reading position.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action that caused this reading position to be set.

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: Volume content version for which this reading position applies.

parameters.name: deviceCookie
parameters.description: Random persistent device cookie optional on set position.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: List categories for onboarding experience.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Default is en-US if unset.

get.description: List available volumes under categories for onboarding experience.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: List of category ids requested.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Default is en-US if unset.

parameters.name: maxAllowedMaturityRating
parameters.description: The maximum allowed maturity rating of returned volumes. Books with a higher maturity rating are filtered out.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of maximum results per page to be included in the response.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of the nextToken from the previous page.

parameters.name: androidId
parameters.description: device android_id

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: device device

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: device manufacturer

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: device model

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: device product

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: device serial

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Volume id to exercise the offer

parameters.name: androidId
parameters.description: device android_id

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: device device

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: device manufacturer

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: device model

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: Offer to dimiss

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: device product

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: device serial

get.description: Returns a list of promo offers available to the user

parameters.name: androidId
parameters.description: device android_id

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: device device

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: device manufacturer

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: device model

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: device product

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: device serial

get.description: Gets volume information for a single volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of volume to retrieve.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: Brand results for partner ID.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Performs a book search.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Full-text search query string.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Restrict to volumes by download availability.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter search results.

parameters.name: langRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict results to books with this language code.

parameters.name: libraryRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict search to this user's library.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort search results.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: Restrict and brand results for partner ID.

parameters.name: printType
parameters.description: Restrict to books or magazines.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields.

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show books available for preorder. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return (starts at 0)

get.description: Return a list of associated books.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of the source volume.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Association type.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'. Used for generating recommendations.

parameters.name: maxAllowedMaturityRating
parameters.description: The maximum allowed maturity rating of returned recommendations. Books with a higher maturity rating are filtered out.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Return a list of books in My Library.

parameters.name: acquireMethod
parameters.description: How the book was aquired

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex:'en_US'. Used for generating recommendations.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: processingState
parameters.description: The processing state of the user uploaded volumes to be returned. Applicable only if the UPLOADED is specified in the acquireMethod.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return (starts at 0)

get.description: Return a list of recommended books for the current user.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'. Used for generating recommendations.

parameters.name: maxAllowedMaturityRating
parameters.description: The maximum allowed maturity rating of returned recommendations. Books with a higher maturity rating are filtered out.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

post.description: Rate a recommended book for the current user.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Rating to be given to the volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: ID of the source volume.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'. Used for generating recommendations.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

get.description: Return a list of books uploaded by the current user.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'. Used for generating recommendations.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: processingState
parameters.description: The processing state of the user uploaded volumes to be returned.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return (starts at 0)

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: The ids of the volumes to be returned. If not specified all that match the processingState are returned.

afterSelectedText.description: Anchor text after excerpt. For requests, if the user bookmarked a screen that has no flowing text on it, then this field should be empty.

beforeSelectedText.description: Anchor text before excerpt. For requests, if the user bookmarked a screen that has no flowing text on it, then this field should be empty.

clientVersionRanges.description: Selection ranges sent from the client.

cfiRange.description: Range in CFI format for this annotation sent by client.

contentVersion.description: Content version the client sent in.

gbImageRange.description: Range in GB image format for this annotation sent by client.

gbTextRange.description: Range in GB text format for this annotation sent by client.

imageCfiRange.description: Range in image CFI format for this annotation sent by client.

created.description: Timestamp for the created time of this annotation.

currentVersionRanges.description: Selection ranges for the most recent content version.

cfiRange.description: Range in CFI format for this annotation for version above.

contentVersion.description: Content version applicable to ranges below.

gbImageRange.description: Range in GB image format for this annotation for version above.

gbTextRange.description: Range in GB text format for this annotation for version above.

imageCfiRange.description: Range in image CFI format for this annotation for version above.

deleted.description: Indicates that this annotation is deleted.

highlightStyle.description: The highlight style for this annotation.

id.description: Id of this annotation, in the form of a GUID.

layerId.description: The layer this annotation is for.

allowedCharacterCount.description: Maximum allowed characters on this layer, especially for the "copy" layer.

limitType.description: Type of limitation on this layer. "limited" or "unlimited" for the "copy" layer.

remainingCharacterCount.description: Remaining allowed characters on this layer, especially for the "copy" layer.

updated.description: Timestamp for the last time this annotation was modified.

volumeId.description: The volume that this annotation belongs to.

annotationType.description: The type of annotation this data is for.

encoded_data.description: Base64 encoded data for this annotation data.

id.description: Unique id for this annotation data.

layerId.description: The Layer id for this data. *

updated.description: Timestamp for the last time this data was updated. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).

volumeId.description: The volume id for this data. *

nextPageToken.description: Token to pass in for pagination for the next page. This will not be present if this request does not have more results.

totalItems.description: Total number of annotations found. This may be greater than the number of notes returned in this response if results have been paginated.

nextPageToken.description: Token to pass in for pagination for the next page. This will not be present if this request does not have more results.

totalItems.description: The total number of volume annotations found.

endOffset.description: The offset from the ending position.

endPosition.description: The ending position for the range.

startOffset.description: The offset from the starting position.

startPosition.description: The starting position for the range.

access.description: Whether this bookshelf is PUBLIC or PRIVATE.

created.description: Created time for this bookshelf (formatted UTC timestamp with millisecond resolution).

id.description: Id of this bookshelf, only unique by user.

updated.description: Last modified time of this bookshelf (formatted UTC timestamp with millisecond resolution).

volumeCount.description: Number of volumes in this bookshelf.

volumesLastUpdated.description: Last time a volume was added or removed from this bookshelf (formatted UTC timestamp with millisecond resolution).

deviceAllowed.description: Whether access is granted for this (user, device, volume).

maxConcurrentDevices.description: The maximum number of concurrent access licenses for this volume.

nonce.description: Client nonce for verification. Download access and client-validation only.

restricted.description: Whether this volume has any concurrent access restrictions.

source.description: Client app identifier for verification. Download access and client-validation only.

timeWindowSeconds.description: Time in seconds for license auto-expiration.

volumeId.description: Identifies the volume for which this entry applies.

title.description: The display title and localized canonical name to use when searching for this entity on Google search.

source.description: The source, url and attribution for this dictionary data.
The words with different meanings but not related words, e.g. "go" (game) and "go" (verb).

deviceAllowed.description: If restricted, whether access is granted for this (user, device, volume).

downloadsAcquired.description: If restricted, the number of content download licenses already acquired (including the requesting client, if licensed).

justAcquired.description: If deviceAllowed, whether access was just acquired with this request.

maxDownloadDevices.description: If restricted, the maximum number of content download licenses for this volume.

nonce.description: Client nonce for verification. Download access and client-validation only.

reasonCode.description: Error/warning reason code. Additional codes may be added in the future. 0 OK 100 ACCESS_DENIED_PUBLISHER_LIMIT 101 ACCESS_DENIED_LIMIT 200 WARNING_USED_LAST_ACCESS

restricted.description: Whether this volume has any download access restrictions.

source.description: Client app identifier for verification. Download access and client-validation only.

volumeId.description: Identifies the volume for which this entry applies.

downloadAccessList.description: A list of download access responses.

lang.description: The language of the information url and description.

previewImageUrl.description: The URL for the preview image information.

snippetUrl.description: The URL for information for this location. Ex: wikipedia link.

title.description: The display title and localized canonical name to use when searching for this entity on Google search.

boundary.description: The boundary of the location as a set of loops containing pairs of latitude, longitude coordinates.

cachePolicy.description: The cache policy active for this data. EX: UNRESTRICTED, RESTRICTED, NEVER

countryCode.description: The country code of the location.

mapType.description: The type of map that should be used for this location. EX: HYBRID, ROADMAP, SATELLITE, TERRAIN

viewport.description: The viewport for showing this location. This is a latitude, longitude rectangle.

zoom.description: The Zoom level to use for the map. Zoom levels between 0 (the lowest zoom level, in which the entire world can be seen on one map) to 21+ (down to individual buildings). See: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/staticmaps/#Zoomlevels

items.description: A list of layer summary items.

totalItems.description: The total number of layer summaries found.

annotationCount.description: The number of annotations for this layer.

annotationTypes.description: The list of annotation types contained for this layer.

annotationsDataLink.description: Link to get data for this annotation.

annotationsLink.description: The link to get the annotations for this layer.

contentVersion.description: The content version this resource is for.

dataCount.description: The number of data items for this layer.

id.description: Unique id of this layer summary.

layerId.description: The layer id for this summary.

updated.description: Timestamp for the last time an item in this layer was updated. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).

volumeAnnotationsVersion.description: The current version of this layer's volume annotations. Note that this version applies only to the data in the books.layers.volumeAnnotations.* responses. The actual annotation data is versioned separately.

volumeId.description: The volume id this resource is for.

items.description: A list of offline dictionary metadata.

epubCfiPosition.description: Position in an EPUB as a CFI.

gbImagePosition.description: Position in a volume for image-based content.

gbTextPosition.description: Position in a volume for text-based content.

kind.description: Resource type for a reading position.

updated.description: Timestamp when this reading position was last updated (formatted UTC timestamp with millisecond resolution).

volumeId.description: Volume id associated with this reading position.

fullTextUrl.description: URL for the full review text, for reviews gathered from the web.

rating.description: Star rating for this review. Possible values are ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE or NOT_RATED.

source.description: Information regarding the source of this review, when the review is not from a Google Books user.

extraDescription.description: Extra text about the source of the review.

url.description: URL of the source of the review.

type.description: Source type for this review. Possible values are EDITORIAL, WEB_USER or GOOGLE_USER.

volumeId.description: Volume that this review is for.

notesExport.description: User settings in sub-objects, each for different purposes.

accessInfo.description: Any information about a volume related to reading or obtaining that volume text. This information can depend on country (books may be public domain in one country but not in another, e.g.).

accessViewStatus.description: Combines the access and viewability of this volume into a single status field for this user. Values can be FULL_PURCHASED, FULL_PUBLIC_DOMAIN, SAMPLE or NONE. (In LITE projection.)

country.description: The two-letter ISO_3166-1 country code for which this access information is valid. (In LITE projection.)

downloadAccess.description: Information about a volume's download license access restrictions.

driveImportedContentLink.description: URL to the Google Drive viewer if this volume is uploaded by the user by selecting the file from Google Drive.

embeddable.description: Whether this volume can be embedded in a viewport using the Embedded Viewer API.

epub.description: Information about epub content. (In LITE projection.)

acsTokenLink.description: URL to retrieve ACS token for epub download. (In LITE projection.)

downloadLink.description: URL to download epub. (In LITE projection.)

isAvailable.description: Is a flowing text epub available either as public domain or for purchase. (In LITE projection.)

explicitOfflineLicenseManagement.description: Whether this volume requires that the client explicitly request offline download license rather than have it done automatically when loading the content, if the client supports it.

pdf.description: Information about pdf content. (In LITE projection.)

acsTokenLink.description: URL to retrieve ACS token for pdf download. (In LITE projection.)

downloadLink.description: URL to download pdf. (In LITE projection.)

isAvailable.description: Is a scanned image pdf available either as public domain or for purchase. (In LITE projection.)

publicDomain.description: Whether or not this book is public domain in the country listed above.

quoteSharingAllowed.description: Whether quote sharing is allowed for this volume.

textToSpeechPermission.description: Whether text-to-speech is permitted for this volume. Values can be ALLOWED, ALLOWED_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY, or NOT_ALLOWED.

viewOrderUrl.description: For ordered but not yet processed orders, we give a URL that can be used to go to the appropriate Google Wallet page.

viewability.description: The read access of a volume. Possible values are PARTIAL, ALL_PAGES, NO_PAGES or UNKNOWN. This value depends on the country listed above. A value of PARTIAL means that the publisher has allowed some portion of the volume to be viewed publicly, without purchase. This can apply to eBooks as well as non-eBooks. Public domain books will always have a value of ALL_PAGES.

webReaderLink.description: URL to read this volume on the Google Books site. Link will not allow users to read non-viewable volumes.

etag.description: Opaque identifier for a specific version of a volume resource. (In LITE projection)

id.description: Unique identifier for a volume. (In LITE projection.)

kind.description: Resource type for a volume. (In LITE projection.)

layerInfo.description: What layers exist in this volume and high level information about them.

layers.description: A layer should appear here if and only if the layer exists for this book.

layerId.description: The layer id of this layer (e.g. "geo").

volumeAnnotationsVersion.description: The current version of this layer's volume annotations. Note that this version applies only to the data in the books.layers.volumeAnnotations.* responses. The actual annotation data is versioned separately.

recommendedInfo.description: Recommendation related information for this volume.

explanation.description: A text explaining why this volume is recommended.

saleInfo.description: Any information about a volume related to the eBookstore and/or purchaseability. This information can depend on the country where the request originates from (i.e. books may not be for sale in certain countries).

buyLink.description: URL to purchase this volume on the Google Books site. (In LITE projection)

country.description: The two-letter ISO_3166-1 country code for which this sale information is valid. (In LITE projection.)

isEbook.description: Whether or not this volume is an eBook (can be added to the My eBooks shelf).

amount.description: Amount in the currency listed below. (In LITE projection.)

currencyCode.description: An ISO 4217, three-letter currency code. (In LITE projection.)

offers.description: Offers available for this volume (sales and rentals).

finskyOfferType.description: The finsky offer type (e.g., PURCHASE=0 RENTAL=3)

rentalDuration.description: The rental duration (for rental offers only).

onSaleDate.description: The date on which this book is available for sale.

retailPrice.description: The actual selling price of the book. This is the same as the suggested retail or list price unless there are offers or discounts on this volume. (In LITE projection.)

amount.description: Amount in the currency listed below. (In LITE projection.)

currencyCode.description: An ISO 4217, three-letter currency code. (In LITE projection.)

saleability.description: Whether or not this book is available for sale or offered for free in the Google eBookstore for the country listed above. Possible values are FOR_SALE, FOR_RENTAL_ONLY, FOR_SALE_AND_RENTAL, FREE, NOT_FOR_SALE, or FOR_PREORDER.

searchInfo.description: Search result information related to this volume.

textSnippet.description: A text snippet containing the search query.

selfLink.description: URL to this resource. (In LITE projection.)

userInfo.description: User specific information related to this volume. (e.g. page this user last read or whether they purchased this book)

isInMyBooks.description: Whether or not this volume is currently in "my books."

isPreordered.description: Whether or not this volume was pre-ordered by the authenticated user making the request. (In LITE projection.)

isPurchased.description: Whether or not this volume was purchased by the authenticated user making the request. (In LITE projection.)

isUploaded.description: Whether or not this volume was user uploaded.

readingPosition.description: The user's current reading position in the volume, if one is available. (In LITE projection.)

rentalPeriod.description: Period during this book is/was a valid rental.

rentalState.description: Whether this book is an active or an expired rental.

review.description: This user's review of this volume, if one exists.

updated.description: Timestamp when this volume was last modified by a user action, such as a reading position update, volume purchase or writing a review. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).

allowAnonLogging.description: Whether anonymous logging should be allowed.

authors.description: The names of the authors and/or editors for this volume. (In LITE projection)

averageRating.description: The mean review rating for this volume. (min = 1.0, max = 5.0)

canonicalVolumeLink.description: Canonical URL for a volume. (In LITE projection.)

categories.description: A list of subject categories, such as "Fiction", "Suspense", etc.

contentVersion.description: An identifier for the version of the volume content (text & images). (In LITE projection)

description.description: A synopsis of the volume. The text of the description is formatted in HTML and includes simple formatting elements, such as b, i, and br tags. (In LITE projection.)

height.description: Height or length of this volume (in cm).

imageLinks.description: A list of image links for all the sizes that are available. (In LITE projection.)

extraLarge.description: Image link for extra large size (width of ~1280 pixels). (In LITE projection)

large.description: Image link for large size (width of ~800 pixels). (In LITE projection)

medium.description: Image link for medium size (width of ~575 pixels). (In LITE projection)

small.description: Image link for small size (width of ~300 pixels). (In LITE projection)

smallThumbnail.description: Image link for small thumbnail size (width of ~80 pixels). (In LITE projection)

thumbnail.description: Image link for thumbnail size (width of ~128 pixels). (In LITE projection)

industryIdentifiers.description: Industry standard identifiers for this volume.

type.description: Identifier type. Possible values are ISBN_10, ISBN_13, ISSN and OTHER.

infoLink.description: URL to view information about this volume on the Google Books site. (In LITE projection)

language.description: Best language for this volume (based on content). It is the two-letter ISO 639-1 code such as 'fr', 'en', etc.

mainCategory.description: The main category to which this volume belongs. It will be the category from the categories list returned below that has the highest weight.

pageCount.description: Total number of pages as per publisher metadata.

previewLink.description: URL to preview this volume on the Google Books site.

printType.description: Type of publication of this volume. Possible values are BOOK or MAGAZINE.

printedPageCount.description: Total number of printed pages in generated pdf representation.

publisher.description: Publisher of this volume. (In LITE projection.)

ratingsCount.description: The number of review ratings for this volume.

readingModes.description: The reading modes available for this volume.

samplePageCount.description: Total number of sample pages as per publisher metadata.

annotationDataId.description: The annotation data id for this volume annotation.

annotationDataLink.description: Link to get data for this annotation.

annotationType.description: The type of annotation this is.

contentRanges.description: The content ranges to identify the selected text.

cfiRange.description: Range in CFI format for this annotation for version above.

contentVersion.description: Content version applicable to ranges below.

gbImageRange.description: Range in GB image format for this annotation for version above.

gbTextRange.description: Range in GB text format for this annotation for version above.

deleted.description: Indicates that this annotation is deleted.

id.description: Unique id of this volume annotation.

layerId.description: The Layer this annotation is for.

updated.description: Timestamp for the last time this anntoation was updated. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).

volumeId.description: The Volume this annotation is for.

nextPageToken.description: Token to pass in for pagination for the next page. This will not be present if this request does not have more results.

totalItems.description: The total number of volume annotations found.

version.description: The version string for all of the volume annotations in this layer (not just the ones in this response). Note: the version string doesn't apply to the annotation data, just the information in this response (e.g. the location of annotations in the book).

totalItems.description: Total number of volumes found. This might be greater than the number of volumes returned in this response if results have been paginated.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.name: key
key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.name: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.
